Title: Don
Writer: Salim Khan (based on an original screenplay by), Javed Akhtar (based on an original screenplay by), Farhan Akhtar
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra, Arjun Rampal, Isha Koppikar
Plot: A simple man, Vijay, is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. But things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.
